tool_description: Calculates optimal product usage amounts, application frequency, and estimates product duration based on routine requirements and product specifications.

product_size.description: Product size in ml or grams

product_type.description: Type: cleanser, serum, moisturizer, sunscreen, treatment, toner, oil

usage_frequency.description: How often used: daily_am, daily_pm, twice_daily, alternate_days, weekly

error_messages: Invalid product size: Size must be positive number
Invalid product type: Use cleanser, serum, moisturizer, sunscreen, treatment, toner, or oil
Invalid frequency: Use daily_am, daily_pm, twice_daily, alternate_days, or weekly
Invalid application area: Use face_only, face_neck, or face_neck_decollete
Product size too small: Minimum 5ml/g for calculations
usage: Input product name, size, type, usage frequency, and application area. Tool calculates optimal usage amounts and duration estimates.

cost_per_day.description: Estimated daily cost if product price provided
